public class EMPTabu extends Object
The tabu search algorithm for the EMP

  • Constructor Details

    • EMPTabu

      public EMPTabu()
      The default constructor for the EMPTabu class. The functions should be all static so the constructor is not actually used.

  • Method Details

    • performTabu

      public static TabuReturn performTabu(int[] initLabels, Map<Integer,Region> integerRegionMap, SpatialGrid r, long[][] dissimMatrix, int tabuLength, int max_no_move, ArrayList<Long> minAttr, ArrayList<Long> maxAttr, ArrayList<Long> avgAttr, ArrayList<Long> sumAttr)
      1 Perform tabu search for the initial solution constructed in the construction phase
      Parameters:
      initLabels - the initial region labels
      integerRegionMap - the initial region maps
      r - the spatial grid for the area set
      dissimMatrix - the pairwise dissimilarity matrix
      tabuLength - the length of the tabu list
      max_no_move - the maximum number of moves for the tabu search
      minAttr - the list of min attribute values
      maxAttr - the list of max attribute values
      avgAttr - the list of avg attribute values
      sumAttr - the list of sum attribute values
      Returns:
      the partition after the tabu search

    • pickMoveAreaNew

      public static List<Integer> pickMoveAreaNew(int[] labels, Map<Integer,Region> regionMap, SpatialGrid r, long[][] dissimMatrix, ArrayList<Long> minAttr, ArrayList<Long> maxAttr, ArrayList<Long> avgAttr, ArrayList<Long> sumAttr)
      Pick the areas that can be moved between regions
      Parameters:
      labels - the region label of the areas
      regionMap - the region maps (id to region)
      r - the spatial grid of the area set
      dissimMatrix - the dissim matrix
      minAttr - the list of min attribute values of the areas
      maxAttr - the list of max attribute values of the areas
      avgAttr - the list of avg attribute values of the areas
      sumAttr - the list of sum attribute values of the areas
      Returns:
      the list of areas that can be moved between regions

    • calculateWithinRegionDistance

      public static long calculateWithinRegionDistance(Map<Integer,Region> regionMap, long[][] dissimMatrix)
      Compute the total within region dissimilarity
      Parameters:
      regionMap - the region map
      dissimMatrix - the matrix for the pairwise dissimilarity
      Returns:
      a long value for the total within region dissimilarity

    • pdist

      public static long[][] pdist(ArrayList<Long> attr)
      Computing the dissimilarity matrix
      Parameters:
      attr - the disimilarity attribute values
      Returns:
      an nxn matrix with entry i,j being the absolutute difference of the dissimilarity attribute of area i and j.
